review: Great product! Got everything I was expecting and more
author: Katelyn Gilman

review: Very easy to use and set up! Works great anywhere in the house!
author: Katie McCullough

review: You still need to pay extra fees every month for Netflix and movies not on Amazon Prime.
author: Rick

review: I converted my dumb bedroom TV into a smart TV.It's used mostly with Amazon Prime, and for that it works quite well, and I've been very happy with it.  I replaced a competitor's device with the Fire Stick because the competitor's Android device wasn't very iOS friendly, and had no remote.
author: Kevin D.

review: This was a gift to my daughter-in-law and she is extremely satisfied with it's performance
author: CrankyOne

review: Good quality picture for a streaming device. Way better than ps4.
author: wayne cockefair

review: Very easy to set up, easy user interface, good idea overall but after 10 days it just quit working, wouldn't turn on, nothing but a black screen. Back it went and plugged in the replacement..worked perfectly, here we are 3 weeks later and now it freezes while loading some things..loads others but then turns to a gray screen. Tried all the trouble shooting, nothing worked. So back it goes..2 fire sticks and barely a month later, this time I'm getting my money back and buying the Roku. For such a large company you'd think a product would work better..very disappointed.
author: Sara
